name: Thrilling Fencing Master
description:
The version with epic weapon is launched now!

The legendary weapon occurs again and is searching for the brave to handle it!
Cool weapon effect and destructive damage bring you the thrilling experience of washing over all!
Take the weapon you like to have a quest in fighting world.
Take advantage of your fighting skills to beat up enemies in every level and unlock new roles and weapons at the same time!

Gameplay
-Control direction on left and attack on right
-Various hot roles come on stage, including ninja, pirate and etc.
-More amazing weapons are optional, such as Laser sword, sickle and god's bow. More mysterious epic weapons are waiting for you to discover.

Tips: Watch out the obstacles and meteors in scene.
------------------------------------------------
Auto-renew
Subscription options

Our game has the following subscription periods:

1. The weekly VIP subscription price is 4.99 USD (3-day free trial). VIP can collect 6 gems and 3000 coins every day. During the validity period, you can get exclusive characters and exclusive weapons and delete ads. The validity period is one week.

2. The monthly VIP subscription price is $9.99. VIP can collect 6 gems and 3000 coins every day. During the validity period, you can get exclusive characters and exclusive weapons and delete ads. The validity period is one month.

3. The annual VIP subscription price is $99.99. VIP can collect 6 gems and 3000 coins every day. During the validity period, you can get exclusive characters and exclusive weapons and delete ads. The validity period is one year.

End of trial and subscription renewal
This price is determined for American customers. Prices in other countries/regions may vary, and actual costs may be converted to your local currency based on your country of residence.

After the purchase is confirmed, the payment will be deducted from your iTunes account.

The subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period, and the renewal fee will be determined.

Subscriptions can be managed by the user, and automatic renewal can be turned off by going to the user's "Account Settings" after purchase.

Any unused portion of the free trial period (if provided) will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription for the publication (if applicable).
